subject: Officiating (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: An N.B.A. spokesman indicated that officials would not respond to news reports that Dick Bavetta, a veteran referee of more than 30 years, had been the subject of inquiries by the F.B.I.
snippet: An N.B.A. spokesman indicated that officials would not respond to news reports that Dick Bavetta, a veteran referee of more than 30 years, had been the subject of inquiries by the F.B.I.
